attributes.additional_details: I am doing this petition to stop the ban on American Bully’s Xl in the uk. For a while now the government have penalised and bullied the breed. What they don’t realise is it’s all down to irresponsible owners, it’s the way you bring them up. I feel like we need to fight back now and stick up for the dogs we love! It’s not fair! Something needs to be done! So please help me and get this petition going everyone seems to forget about all the other vicious breeds out there, it’s always xl’s! stop!
attributes.background: I want to stop the ban on xl bully uk

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action:  https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/643611
